content:
The first time Leo possessed Adrian's body, he felt a rush of excitement and amazement. It was like nothing he had ever experienced before, and he felt like he had been given a whole new world of possibilities.

As he took control of Adrian's body, he could feel the vampire's strength and power flowing through him. He felt like he was invincible, and he was filled with a sense of freedom and adventure.

At the same time, Leo also felt a deep connection with Adrian. He could sense the other boy's emotions and thoughts, and he felt like they were truly one being. It was a strange and wonderful feeling, and Leo knew that he had found something truly special.

Overall, possessing Adrian's body was an incredible experience for Leo. It gave him a sense of power and connection that he had never felt before, and he knew that he would never forget it.
